articles.title: Tommy Lasorda, legendary Los Angeles Dodgers manager, has died - CNN
articles.description: Tommy Lasorda, who spent seven decades in the Dodgers organization -- first as a player in Brooklyn and then in Los Angeles as a two-time World Series winning manager -- has died. He was 93.
